'''Streets of Elegance''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Realm of Tranquil Eternity]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 48]].

==Trivia==
* ''{{PAGENAME}}'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]] for this song.
